chemaxon.formats

Class MolFormatException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.io.IOException
          • chemaxon.formats.MolFormatException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NameFormatException

    public class MolFormatException
extends IOException
    Something's wrong with a molecule file format.
    Version:
    5.0.1, 01/30/2008
    Author:
    Peter Csizmadia
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
